Why Start Your Career with the QarirGenerator Scholarship Program?

Focus on increasing value and developing work portfolio

Intensive mentoring with a dual mentorship program Experts will help you improve your technology skills and career mentors from HR experts will develop your potential and increase your selling point!

In-depth class open to beginners. Apply for an in-depth class, to make you understand more, at no additional cost!

Interest-free, fine-free financial assistance! High quality education is accessible to anyone now! Apply for a scholarship with payment in full or installments directly to the QarirGenerator Financial Aid Department.

Where to Start?

Are you a student?

Without any degree start studying technology and digital business industry! In this career accelerator program you get:

Career support sessions every month to get a job more easily

Apprenticeship experience program to build your first work experience

Are you a Fresh Graduate or Early Career Person?

Starting a career in technology without IT/Statistics experience? Can! In this career accelerator program you get:

Apprenticeship experience program to build your first work experience

Global job connector opportunities for working abroad opportunities

Establish relationships with professionals and company leaders

Are you a career switcher?

In this career accelerator program you get:

Global job connector opportunities for working abroad opportunities

Establish relationships with professionals and company leaders

Strong personal branding assistance to facilitate your career switching process!
